product_name: Lowa Cevedale GTX Mountaineering Boots - Women's - 2010 Closeout
long_description: The women's Lowa Cevedale Pro GTX mountaineering boots give you the support and waterproof protection you need for technical ascents, yet are lightweight and flexible for comfort on your climb. Seam-sealed GORE-TEX(R) liners with wicking polyester linings deliver complete waterproof protection and allow moisture vapor to escape. Split leather, synthetic microfiber and Cordura(R) nylon uppers are lightweight and flexible; rubber randing helps protect uppers. Boot design allows ankles and uppers to flex naturally while maintaining a stable platform underfoot; tongue studs improve lacing pressure distribution. Durable, shock-absorbent polyurethane midsoles feature thermopastic urethane inserts for additional support. Rigid, full-length nylon plates control flex and add the stability needed during use on rough terrain and with crampons. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on the Lowa Cevedale Pro GTX mountaineering boots offer excellent grip, stability and durability for alpine adventures. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Lowa Cevedale Pro GTX mountaineering boots give you the support and waterproof protection you need for technical ascents, yet are lightweight and flexible for comfort on your climb.
